subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Apolo Anton Ohno won the 1,000- and 3,000-meter races at the United States Short Track Speedskating Championships in Chesterfield, Mo., to capture his eighth consecutive national title, with 4,140 points.
snippet: Apolo Anton Ohno won the 1,000- and 3,000-meter races at the United States Short Track Speedskating Championships in Chesterfield, Mo., to capture his eighth consecutive national title, with 4,140 points.
